remarks: Consequence of "restricted at most one."  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Dec-2019.)
statement:
rmoi2.1 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
rmoi2.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. A ) $.
rmoi2.3 $e |- ( ph -> E* x e. A ps ) $.
rmoi2.4 $e |- ( ph -> x e. A ) $.
rmoi2.5 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
rmoi2.6 $e |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
rmoi2 $p |- ( ph -> x = B ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ch x $.
